module.name: codycoTrajGenDemoY2
module.description: Trajectory generator helper for CoDyCo second year demo.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: This module takes reference set points for several limbs and the robot CoM, and outputs the trajectories for use of the torqueBalancing module. This is not a generic module, and should be used only for CoDyCo Second Year demo applications.

param.desc: module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix name.
name of the robot to connect to.

input.description: Receive a Property object, on which reference set points for the different parts and for the com are saved.
